title: Somebodies: A YouTube Orchestra
brief_description: A mash-up of parodies, homages and covers of Gotye’s iconic 2011 track, ‘Somebody That I Used to Know’.

constellations_other.name: Viral music videos
constellations_other.description: Gotye's 'Somebody that I used to know' was one of the internet's most viral music videos, seconded only to Queen Bey's 'Singles Ladies'.

description: A mash-up of parodies, homages and covers of Gotye’s iconic 2011 track, ‘Somebody That I Used to Know’.
description_for_label: A mash-up of parodies, homages and covers of Gotye’s iconic 2011 track, ‘Somebody That I Used to Know’.
